original_text: God was also angry because David had done this thing. So he decided to punish Israel.
korean_text: 하나님이 이 일을 악하게 여기사 이스라엘을 치시매

sentences.original_text: because David had done this thing
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 다윗이 이 일을 행했기 때문이었다

sentences.original_text: So he decided to punish Israel
